about_the_game:
WHAT’S THE DEAL?

You’re stuck in a never-ending cycle, always getting slain by shiny heroes. But I, Kos—friendly chaos incarnate—am here to help you! Now that you’ve freed me, I’ll guide you to break this eternal loop and take down the big boss, The Eye of Eternity. Just take my runes, use your special powers, and we’ll end this together… right, buddy? Trust me—you won’t regret it!

KEY FEATURES

  • Rune-Driven Card Battles – Unleash combos of attacks, shields, poisons, and more.

  • Die, Reincarnate, Repeat – Each run’s tougher, but you’ll remember everything.

  • Crazy Artifacts & Curses – Boost your power or sabotage yourself. It’s all chaos!

  • Chaotic Story & Unlocks – Discover new runes, missions, and twisted lore as you go.

  • Epic Showdowns – Heroes and bosses with unique moves, ready to smack you down. (Rude, I know.)

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT

Because I, Kos, say so! Okay, and because it’s a card-battling roguelike with a dash of cosmic lunacy—and you’ll get to see who’s really pulling the strings in this wild universe. (Hint: It’s not who you think!)

JOIN THE FIGHT

Ready to flip this cycle upside down?
Wishlist Unbound Eternity now and prove you can handle a little chaos, buddy!

(Hehehe… can’t wait!)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500, Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: Apple M2 or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: Apple M2
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,6 Ghz Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2,6 Ghz Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Unbound Eternity is a card-battling roguelike where you and your mischievous pal, Kos, break a cosmic cycle. Harness runes for strategic combos, build your deck with chaotic powers, and challenge divine bosses. Keep your memories, upgrade your gear, and embrace the chaos!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Polish
